page.title: Banana
page.keywords: wiki, roblox bus simulator, roblox bus sim, roblox bus sim biomes

header.title: Banana
header.description: Banana is an NPC that can be found in the Backwalls. They can be rarely found in the event.

content.quote: Once, I saw kinda-image looking thing at the end of the hallway. It didn't look like the ones I'm used to. I didn't get any closer to it, and I never saw it again. Guess we'll never know.
content.author: Pear

content.name: It will chase a player and fling them.

children.name: However, it occasionally doesn't move and stops at certain points.

content.name: The image it originates from is a Fruit Gushers commercial.

Despite being intended to be a nuisance in the Backwalls, it can actually be a useful asset, as the noise it makes can serve as a waypoint to keep track of. This is even more helpful if it's near the exit.
